Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files; SCR17533 Replaced FileSize()>0 checks by
FileExist() function
13.01.2012 JH SCR17018 Added running number(v.Counter) in Pos 5-12 of all written rows.
03.02.2009 GB SCR14358 Change of way sending message via email
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
30.11.2006 SH SCR12123 Added DRFT_COUNTRY_DEBTOR = 'MC' test for DRFTselction
04.08.2006 JJ SCR11682 Extended country selection with DT
10.07.2006 SH SCR11231 Added using of table JOBE to send file to mult receivers
10.05.2006 SH SCR11215 Removed GB723 from program
02.02.2006 SH SCR10294 Extended selection of DRFT with DRFT_LETTERCODE = ''
01.12.2005 SH SCR8451 Mult amounts for file with 100, because decimals have to
be also written to file
29.11.2005 SH SCR8451 Added CHR(13)&CHR(10) to end of every output line, now
162 char long, set Format = NONE for I/O files, so that every line is filled
with necessary blanks at the end of every row
29.08.2005 SH SCR8451WISS06REC: changed the picture of BLANK1 to FILLER2
24.06.2005 SH SCR8451 If BPH403 is runing on i5 then convertion
of UNIX based text-files to Windows format has to be performed; fixed problem
in WISS07REC according to HEADER (07) and CODE_OPERATION (60)
-- global variables
-- working fields
-- PI.HUSR_ID is mandatory, if blank turn serverjob to message wait
-- Produce TXT file only if PI.HUSR_ID <> blank
-- Prepare global variables
... get directory for TXT File
... and add file name
-- Perform some database updates for DRFT rows, before start with preparing the
bank file
-- Produced TXT bank file
-- Send file to users who needs the file
... problems occured in GM102, sending of email failed
... no TXT file was produced

ExpSyntax.val: IF (FileExist (Trim ({0,4})),MlsTrans ('BPH403 - File to bank'),MlsTrans ('BPH403 - No file for the bank produced'))
